measures.title: Code Validations
measures.narrative: Code Validation checks the extract fields which contain code values against the code tables and corresponding code maps.

measures.title: Referential Integrity
measures.narrative: Referential Integrity checks for orphans in parent-child relationships between extracts. (See detail page for a graph of relationships)

measures.title: Loading Exceptions
measures.narrative: Loading Exceptions shows how many errors occurred during attempted loading of extracts.

measures.title: Clinic Matching
measures.narrative: Clinic Matching checks existing Appointments against the clinic schedule appointment slots. This gives an indication of how many slots are missing and if the mapping is working correctly.
